Articles.Content:
Hello All,

Sorry if this is a stupid question - it's my first post... When my KSP updated today to v0.25.XX, I am now unable to connect parts together without gaps between the vehicle parts. When the vehicle is placed on the pad for launch, there are large gaps between the parts! What's the deal? I have been using KSP for 2 months before and never had this issue... Is it a settings issue?? Thanks in advance! (tried to submit 2 images but cannot figure out how to attach them!)
I have Near and kw rocketry installed on mine
If a mod doesn't say it's compatible with 0.25, don't expect 0.25 to work right if you have that mod installed.

I think NathanKell is correct. After a little investigation, I found most of the "separated" parts are the KW Rocketry parts - most of the stock parts still fit together ok. Hopefully KW will update the mod soon? Thanks to all!
